title: nArAyaNAya namO nArAyaNAya
sahitya:
nArAyaNa namO nArAyaNa namO nArAyaNa namO


caraNam 1    harikrSNa sharaNanalu adu nimage lEsu hariya kIrtanegaLanu jagadoLage sUsu 
hari bhaktiyilladavara sangakke lEsu hariya maretare munde narakave hAsu
    caraNam 2    durjanara maneyaliha hAla saviyinta sajjanara maneyali nIre lEsenda 
durjanara oDanADa samsargadinda nirjIviyAgiruva kADe lEsenda
    caraNam 3    indriyangaLa sukhava neccadiru kaNDya indrAdigaLa bhavaNeyanu nODi koNDya 
endinantalla dEhava kaLeve kaNDya hindu mundina gatiya tiLiyadava bhaNDa
    caraNam 4    eLe tuLasi vanamAle dharisikoLa bEku tilakOrdhava puNDaragaLanu hacca bEku 
naLina nAbhana smaraNeyoLu muLuga bEku iLeyoLage vaikuNThavanu sArabEku
    caraNam 5    sirivarana bhaktaranu sEvisalu bEku piridAgi dAna dharmavAcarisa bEku 
dharaNi puNya sthaLava meTTutira bEku purandara viTTalanna satata nene bEku
